context.p: You can access the available subtitles through the PTMediaPlayerItem property's subtitlesOptions.

step.cmd: Register the client as a listener for the PTMediaPlayerMediaSelectionOptionsAvailableNotification notification.
step.info: [[NSNotificationCenter defaultCenter] addObserver:self selector:@selector(onMediaPlayerItemMediaSelectionOptionsAvailable:) name:PTMediaPlayerMediaSelectionOptionsAvailableNotification object:self.player]; When your client receives this notification, the subtitles are ready in the PTMediaPlayerItem.
